Microsoft Azure MVP Bootcamp
The Microsoft MVPs are in town - come and meet them!
Register Today
November 12, 2016

09:00 AM IST

Miracle Heights
About The Event
After 3 successful Microsoft Azure Technical Workshops this year, AP Cloud, Miracle and Microsoft are back with an excellent community event. On November 12th, 2016, Miracle's APAC Headquarters, Miracle Heights will be hosting 3 Microsoft MVPs who will take you through the cloud platform from Microsoft. The workshop will encompass sessions, demos and much more around Azure Platform such as Azure App Services, Universal Windows Platform, Azure Identity Management and Security, Azure Cloud Infrastructure, Automation, and DevOPS.
AP Cloud has begun its next wave and is becoming the largest cloud enabled program in the world! The event starts at 09:00 AM IST and continues with hands-on lab, workshops, and sessions and ends at 05:00 PM IST. It's a great opportunity to experience knowledge with real time solutions and ignite intelligence in a creative way.
Register Here
Meet And Greet The MVP's!!
Ravikanth Chaganti
Popularly known to the tech world as a virtualization, cloud, and enterprise application expert, current lead architect for Microsoft UC&C, Microsoft and VMware private and hybrid cloud solutions within the Enterprise Solutions Group at Dell Inc., a multi-year recipient of Microsoft MVP award in Windows PowerShell and Microsoft Azure, author for Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration Revealed (Apress), and a lead for Bangalore PowerShell and Bangalore IT Pro User Groups, and a regular speaker at local user group events and conferences in India and abroad
Know more about Ravikanth at
www.ravichaganti.com and twitter.com/Ravikanth
Kunal Chowdhury
Honoured as Microsoft MVP for 7 times, Windows 10 Champion, Microsoft India Rockstar, CodeProject Mentor, speaker in various Microsoft events, DZone MVB, passionate author and blogger, and Nokia Developer Champion for his contribution towards Windows Phone and Nokia Lumia
Kunal shares his technical findings in his technical blog
www.kunal-chowdhury.com
Kunal Chandratre
An outstanding Microsoft Azure MVP for 3 consecutive years, and a well known Cloud Solution Architect for Microsoft who is very much interested in helping customers in their migration journey to Azure IaaS and PaaS, a provider of Azure architectural designs and solutions, a corporate trainer, a passionate speaker in Azure cloud events along with public conferences, and an avid blogger who contributes regularly to MSDN forum, and personal blog including DotNetCurry (DNC) magazine
You can follow Kunal at
twitter.com/kunalchandratre
Sessions At The Event
Title : Azure Cloud and DevOps
Speaker : Ravikanth Chaganti | 90 minutes
Description : There’s a lot of buzz around DevOps right now. An organization’s custom software is critical in providing rich experiences and useful data to its business users. Rapidly delivering quality software is no longer an option, it’s a requirement. Cloud platforms such as Microsoft Azure have removed traditional bottlenecks and helped commoditize infrastructure.
This session intends to introduce the Microsoft eco-system that enables the DevOps capabilities in the Azure Cloud. At the end of the session, audience will have an understanding of different tools and scenarios where some of these tools can be useful when implementing DevOps practices.
Title : Azure App Services & Universal Windows Platform
Speaker : Kunal Chowdhury | 90 minutes
Description : Azure App Service is a fully managed Platform as a Service (PaaS) offering for professional developers that brings a rich set of capabilities to web, mobile and integration scenarios. Mobile Apps in Azure App Service offers a highly scalable, globally available mobile application development platform for Enterprise Developers and System.
With this platform, you can add sign-in, push notifications, and data sync to your mobile app, and connect your app to enterprise systems and on-premises resources. Scale your app to millions of customers across multiple geographies. In this session, you will learn about Azure App Services and attend a demo on getting started with integrating a service in an app targeting Universal Windows Platform (UWP) for Windows 10 ecosystem and other app platforms.
Title : Azure Identity Management and Security
Speaker : Kunal Chandratre | 90 minutes
Description : In the recent years, Azure Active Directory has become center point of authentication mechanism for Azure Cloud Services. It is a comprehensive identity and access management cloud solution that provides a robust set of capabilities to manage users and groups. It helps secure access to on-premises and cloud applications, including Microsoft online services like Office 365 and many non-Microsoft SaaS applications. Combining Azure Resource manager with RBAC capabilities makes it an awesome platform providing granular access control to Azure resources.
This session is about understanding the fundamentals, terminologies, and architecture used with respect to Active Directory. It will address an important question on how it differs from Windows Server AD and covers a demo on various ways of securing ASP.NET MVC application using Azure AD. It will also walk you through important features and capabilities of Azure Resource Manager and how they can be used in conjunction with Azure AD.
AP Cloud is an initiative backed by Miracle Software Systems, Inc. to create 100,000 Digital Transformation Professionals in the Sunrise State of Andhra Pradesh. The AP Cloud Initiative has begun its first wave on 05th August, 2016 which upholds a vision of developing skillful professionals in the Digital Transformation platform. This program helps people make a career in this platform and thereby increases the economic impact on the state.
Moving towards the Miracle's vision of "100,000 Digital Transformation Skilled Professionals in AP", we have successfully trained 3000 students across 15 colleges in Andhra Pradesh on different technologies such as MEAN Stack, Ionic, Hybrid Cloud and more. Our goal is to ensure that Andhra Pradesh becomes the center of the world for Digital Transformation and Cloud Services.
